from dataclasses import dataclass, field
from typing import List, Dict

@dataclass
class Component:
    name: str
    spec: str
    weight_kg: float
    cost_krw: int
    supplier: str = ""

@dataclass
class ElectricMotoSpec:
    battery: Component
    motor: Component
    controller: Component
    frame: Component
    suspension_front: Component
    suspension_rear: Component
    brake_system: Component
    wheels: List[Component]
    others: List[Component] = field(default_factory=list)

    def total_weight(self) -> float:
        total = self.battery.weight_kg + self.motor.weight_kg + self.controller.weight_kg
        total += self.frame.weight_kg + self.suspension_front.weight_kg + self.suspension_rear.weight_kg
        total += self.brake_system.weight_kg + sum(w.weight_kg for w in self.wheels)
        total += sum(o.weight_kg for o in self.others)
        return round(total, 2)

    def total_cost(self) -> int:
        total = self.battery.cost_krw + self.motor.cost_krw + self.controller.cost_krw
        total += self.frame.cost_krw + self.suspension_front.cost_krw + self.suspension_rear.cost_krw
        total += self.brake_system.cost_krw + sum(w.cost_krw for w in self.wheels)
        total += sum(o.cost_krw for o in self.others)
        return total
